alert.note: Alert for White Mountains (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 10 at 2:07PM MST until December 12 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM LATE SUNDAY NIGHT THROUGH MONDAY EVENING ABOVE 5000 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible above 5000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 12 inches possible. Higher amounts are possible near the Sunrise Ski Resort in the White Mountains. Winds could gust as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Areas above 5000 feet near Alpine, Pinetop-Lakeside, Show Low and Whiteriver. * WHEN...From late Sunday night through Monday evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. Snow forecast from 5 AM Monday to 11 PM Monday: Alpine 3 to 5 inches Pinetop-Lkside 4 to 8 inches Show Low 4 to 6 inches Whiteriver 4 to 6 inches
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
